name: stop the flow! - rescue puzzle
description:
In this game, the lines you draw become walls.
Use the walls you create to save people and cities from oncoming waves, magma, and enemies.

You can save your city and people by diverting the flowing liquid and stopping the flow.
If the lines you draw collide with each other, the game will be over, so be careful!

There are currently over 150 levels. Stay tuned to the end!

EU / California users can opt-out under GDPR / CCPA.
Please respond from the pop-up displayed when starting in the app or within the settings in the app.
